title: Sword shops

properties.name: description
properties.value: Sword shops are a type of store throughout Gielinor. The stores are represented by a  icon. There are 14 Sword shops in RuneScape.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Sword shops

Sword shops are a type of store throughout Gielinor. The stores are represented by a icon. There are 14 Sword shops in RuneScape.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Free-to-play[edit | edit source]

  • Varrock Swordshop in Varrock. This store sells Swords, Longswords and Daggers up to Adamant.

Members[edit | edit source]

  • Armoury in Combat Training Camp. This store sells 2h swords up to Adamant, and other combat equipment.
  • Blades by Urbi in Sophanem. This store sells Daggers up to Dragon, (Black and Dragon has 0 stock) and scimitars up to steel.
  • Briget's Weapons in Shayzien. This store sells most Melee weapons up to Adamant.
  • Gaius' Two-Handed Shop in Taverley. This store sells 2h swords up to Adamant.
  • Gulluck and Sons in the Grand Tree. This store sells 2h swords up to Adamant, and other combat equipment. Lower prices than Armoury.
  • Iorwerth's Arms in Prifddinas. This store sells high level Daggers, Scimitars and Halberds.
  • Jukat (shop) in Zanaris. This store sells Dragon Longsword, Dragon Dagger.
  • Myths' Guild Weaponry in the Myths' Guild. This store sells various Dragon Weapons.
  • Nardok's Bone Weapons in Dorgesh-Kaan. This store sells Dorgeshuun weapons.
  • Quality Weapons Shop in Keldagrim. This store sells an assortment of weapons.
  • TzHaar-Hur-Tel's Equipment Store in Mor Ul Rek. This store sells Obsidian equipment, exchanged for Tokkul.
  • Vigr's Warhammers in Keldagrim. This store sells Warhammers up to Adamant.
  • Warrior Guild Armoury in the Warriors' Guild. This store sells most Melee weapons up to Adamant.

rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''Sword shops''' are a type of store throughout [[Gielinor]]. The stores are represented by a [[File:Sword shop icon.png]] icon. There are 14 Sword shops in ''RuneScape''.

==Locations==
===Free-to-play===
*[[Varrock Swordshop]] in [[Varrock]]. This store sells [[Swords]], [[Longswords]] and [[Daggers]] up to Adamant.

===Members===
*[[Armoury]] in [[Combat Training Camp]]. This store sells [[2h swords]] up to Adamant, and other combat equipment.
*[[Blades by Urbi]] in [[Sophanem]]. This store sells [[Daggers]] up to Dragon, (Black and Dragon has 0 stock) and scimitars up to steel. 
*[[Briget's Weapons]] in [[Shayzien]]. This store sells most Melee weapons up to Adamant.
*[[Gaius' Two-Handed Shop]] in [[Taverley]]. This store sells [[2h swords]] up to Adamant.
*[[Gulluck and Sons]] in the [[Grand Tree]]. This store sells [[2h swords]] up to Adamant, and other combat equipment. Lower prices than [[Armoury]].
*[[Iorwerth's Arms]] in [[Prifddinas]]. This store sells high level Daggers, Scimitars and Halberds.
*[[Jukat (shop)]] in [[Zanaris]]. This store sells [[Dragon Longsword]], [[Dragon Dagger]].
*[[Myths' Guild Weaponry]] in the [[Myths' Guild]]. This store sells various [[Dragon_equipment#Weapons|Dragon Weapons]].
*[[Nardok's Bone Weapons]] in [[Dorgesh-Kaan]]. This store sells [[Dorgeshuun weapons]].
*[[Quality Weapons Shop]] in [[Keldagrim]]. This store sells an assortment of weapons.
*[[TzHaar-Hur-Tel's Equipment Store]] in [[Mor Ul Rek]]. This store sells [[Obsidian equipment]], exchanged for [[Tokkul]].
*[[Vigr's Warhammers]] in [[Keldagrim]]. This store sells [[Warhammers]] up to Adamant.
*[[Warrior Guild Armoury]] in the [[Warriors' Guild]]. This store sells most Melee weapons up to Adamant.

{{Shops}}
